title: Garen Noble bot splash art bug
body:
Have only seen this once since 5.8
Just making sure you have also seen it.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're currently aware of the issue and investigating.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=UgQfIbtV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-03T06:49:06.518+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! We're currently aware of the issue and investigating.

Happens with Prime Lucian too :)
Yea I'm getting this too, strange...
